thread.title: Horse down cliffs at Cammachmore sparks rescue effort
thread.title_full: Horse down cliffs at Cammachmore sparks rescue effort

title: Horse down cliffs at Cammachmore sparks rescue effort
text:
Horse down cliffs at Cammachmore sparks rescue effort 23 February 2017 Close share panel A horse stuck down a cliff has sparked a rescue operation. 
The animal was understood to be partially down the cliff in the Cammachmore area of Aberdeenshire. 
Several units from the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service - including a specialist team from Perth - were heading to the scene.
